cause.description:
potential donors,
$10 will buy a bed net. the net will be distributed based on need to potential malaria victims. it will help. the end.
malaria is present in 106 nations.
in sub-saharan africa, around 50% of children are infected by malaria.
and only 2% of african children are able to buy and use bed nets.
nets cut number of infections in half, and child death rates by a third.
1. help.
2. one net...
3. at a time.
cause.mission: buy nets. stop malaria. save lives.
cause.name: buy a net. save a life.
